content: Hi, everybody! We are representing a small team in Saint-Petersburg, that are trying to simplify a life of one of our hospitals. Especially in the laboratory part. We are developing custom software to work with REGIZ (russian server for accomadation of all laboratory applications in the city that works using FHIR). So it turned out that its quite hard to manage all the buisness procceses in a simple way. Hope that together we can impliment the best practises to bring real help to our medicine.
Could you describe your specific buisness processes and difficulties with FHIR API?
Hi everybody we are going to organise 1-2 days FHIR event in Sankt-Peterburg in 25-26 June. Contact me if you want to present!
